Title: LightReader
Description: LightReader will be a Silverlight-based feed reader.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A Silverlight 2.0-based RSS feed reader.

As for 3/21/2009, LightReader has been upgraded to SL 2.0.

Plans for the application include:
- Internal display of blog posts (no more opening another browser window to read the posts)
- Improved user interface
- Improved workflow
- Improved architecture (refactor / re-write to MVVM)
- Possible port to 3.0 beta
